topic.title: Tigran Hamasyan "Shadow Theater" - The Court Jester (Official)
topic.body:
Tigran Hamasyan, piano
Areni Agbabian, voix 
Ben Wendel, saxophone
Chris Tordini, basse
Nate Wood, batterie
Vidéaste: Ruben van Leer
Orchestre à cordes: Karen Jeauffreau, Jules Dussap, Charlotte Vergnes, Theo Ceccaldi, Noé Natorp, Manon Gillardot, Octovio Angarita & Myrtille Hetzel
Production, booking & management: GiantSteps, www.g-steps.com
Concert enregistré à la Grande Halle de la Villette, Paris le 5 septembre 2013
Réalisation: Samuel Thiebaut et Ruben Van Leer
Montage vidéo: Ruben Van Leer
Mixage son: Patrick Jauneaud
Mastering son: Francois Fanelli

2_1DTUNWykvXLbxZud5a8gJsq7DxmxcGk52E.body:
> [technoshaman777](#comment_4_1DTUNWykvXLbxZud5a8gJsq7DxmxcGk52E): Kopykate,
>  I uploaded this new one and it works. You can get rid of the other copy that did not work. It would be nice if you could provide an edit option for videos that we have personally uploaded. By the way, how hard is it to embed the ability to Chromecast these videos? If we had that, then I think there is great potential to build a ZeroNetflix that would have the same ease of use that we expect from traditional streaming content. Of course, it would also be nice if we could figure out how to integrate the features of Plex media center to pull cover art and metadata down as well. I'm not a coder or web developer, so I'm just hopeing someone can make it happen!

It's already possible with WebTorrent to stream videos to AirPlay, Chromecast, XBMC, etc.
